daily_summary.headline: Routine Launches and Quiet Aurora Forecast

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 10-36
top_events.description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 Block 5 is set to launch the Starlink Group 10-36, continuing the expansion of the Starlink satellite constellation.
top_events.action: Watch live stream for launch details.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: A minor geomagnetic storm may allow aurora viewing at high latitudes, with a Kp index of 4.
top_events.action: Check local conditions for aurora visibility.

top_events.title: Firefly Alpha | Stairway to Seven
top_events.description: Firefly Aerospace's test flight of the Firefly Alpha rocket aims to validate key systems ahead of future upgrades.
top_events.action: Monitor updates for test flight results.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
